Topic.Title: Save button does not always activate?

Posts.EditableText:
Working through my first web text adventure.

I am using the online version, but it seems as if the "save" button is not always active? I have lost several items and descriptions as I am working and testing. Any thoughts or advice?

Thanks

Kelso
Posts.HTML:
Working through my first web text adventure.

I am using the online version, but it seems as if the "save" button is not always active? I have lost several items and descriptions as I am working and testing. Any thoughts or advice?

Kelso

Posts.EditableText: As far as I know, as you switch from object to object, it should save automatically. That's why you often can't save - because it already has for you. If you can find a repeatable case where it loses what you've entered, I'd be willing to explore it a bit.
Posts.HTML: As far as I know, as you switch from object to object, it should save automatically. That's why you often can't save - because it already has for you. If you can find a repeatable case where it loses what you've entered, I'd be willing to explore it a bit.

Posts.EditableText:

I will watch this and see what I might be doing wrong.
